intro.title: Field Dispatches
intro.description: Each campaign documents the craft process, partners, and environmental commitments tied to a release.

entries.title: Signal / 2025
entries.description: An eight-piece capsule inspired by maritime telegraph codes. Features knurled textures and reversible pendants.

entries.title: Low Tide Study
entries.description: Explores negative space by pairing ultra-thin bangles with hollow-core cuffs. Produced in recycled sterling silver.

entries.title: Night Bloom
entries.description: Oxidized finishes with hand-carved patterns referencing indigenous night-blooming flora. All profits supported local reef care.
